Title: Silverlight 4 Voice Recorder And Uploader
Description:
This is A sample Audio recorder with playback which upload the voice file to server using silverlight 4 ...
This project wouldn't have any sequel and its just can be used as a sample or tutorial
more info here: http://nokhodian.info/?p=12
HomeWiki: This is a sample in silverlight 4 to record and playbak user's voice and send the file to server
